quest.name: The Sound of Fear
journal:
 Quest Sync
The overwrought dragon can no longer find it in himself to relax.
objectives: Scout the area around Reah Tahra.

dialogue.name: DRAGON04339
dialogue.text: Hark! The grinding and shuddering of steel bodies... The metal, it cometh!

dialogue.name: DRAGON04339
dialogue.text: ...Thou hearest naught? Mayhaps thy species hath not the sensitivity... Yet the machines come nevertheless.

dialogue.name: DRAGON04339
dialogue.text: Seek a vantage from which even thou mayest witness their dread approach...then hearken unto my words, and flee.

dialogue.name: DRAGON04339
dialogue.text: Flee, stranger, shouldst thou value thy life.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: No one but dragons here. Forsooth!

dialogue.name: DRAGON04339
dialogue.text: Thou art returned... What didst thou ken?

dialogue.name: DRAGON04339
dialogue.text: ...Perhaps thou speakest in sooth. That mechanical cacophony plagueth me without cease... Though I swear 'tis clearer now than it hath ever been.

dialogue.name: DRAGON04339
dialogue.text: Should this be naught but mine own fears, returned fiercer with each coming... I know not how to quit myself of them.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Find strength in your comrades, and together overcome your fears.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You must embrace your fear to truly understand it.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You should fear nothing, as I do.

dialogue.name: DRAGON04339
dialogue.text: Thou art strong. Had my kin sought what thou hast found, perhaps our star would have met a different fate...

dialogue.name: DRAGON04339
dialogue.text: Thou art strong. Would that my kin had sought what thou hast found...

dialogue.name: DRAGON04339
dialogue.text: ...Though there may yet be time. Naught can alter history's course, but the future awaiteth still. I thank thee for thine insight, courageous one.
